Title: Otona no Bouguya-san
Description: ["Kautz was looking for a job and suddenly he gets hired by an armor shop. But it's not your run of the mill armor shop, it's an adult armor shop. An ecchi comedy showing the shopkeeper side of selling sexy battle armor. "]
Staff: [['Yamamoto, Junichi', 'Director, Series Composition'], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', 'Sound Director'], ['Satou, Masato', 'Episode Director'], ['Inai, Keiji', 'Music']]
